author: Brian Hunt
comment: Nice design, nice customization. Just hate that the watch arms hide half the skull. Would also be nice to be able to change the back ground to other solid colors. Black background with the rest set to steel would look better than carbon.
title: Not bad

author: Eric Jackson
comment: I really like the customizable face.  It makes my LG G Watch R really pop. One small critique, is that the face is just slightly off center.  It needs pushed to the left just a bit.

author: Joshua Gilbert
comment: Please fix this problem does not fit on my moto 360 2nd gen

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content:
Which Problem Mr. Gilbert?

Please contact us at scoondesign@gmail.com

Thanks

author: Tim Dupont
comment: What is it telling you when the sword handle is in between the plus in minus symbols? Excellent watch face by the way!.
title: Plus Minus symbols with sword handle in it

author: Clint Davis
comment: I would love to see integration of camouflage
title: Love it

author: Mr. Paladin
comment: This watch face is a work of art.  It's easy to see the designers spent many hours working on it.  It has many changeable looks.  My favorite is the red, white and blue one.  I don't know how anyone can put that much time in an app and give it away for free!

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content:
Thank you Lon. Your work is also very nice.

title: Most beautiful watch face

comment: Arrgg there be pirates. Perfect timing for the Gaparilla Pirate invasion and parade in my city..

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content: Ayay... hope ya don't slaughter everyone fellow watchmaker

title: Love it

author: Maitin Rhode
comment: I've been following your work since you started on the watchmaker Google group.  Very well done... Thank you.

reply.author: Scoon Design
reply.content: Thnx Martin. Hope to create a great collection!

title: Another great job
